remarks.para: May be inoperative provided visual confirmation of proper elevator movement is made before each departure.

placard.para: Placard below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel: "ELEV POS IND INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: Perform visual check of surface movement:

warning.para: ENSURE THAT PERSONNEL AND EQUIPMENT ARE CLEAR OF ALL FLIGHT CONTROL SURFACES.

entry.para: Control Column Full Aft, then Full Forward
Observe all four elevators up, down.

note.para: Outboard elevator deflection will be approximately 23° up, 17° down. Inboard elevator deflection will be approximately 25° up, 16° down.

numlitem.para: Restore aircraft to its required configuration.
